alert.note: Alert for Juniata; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 10:23AM EDT until July 09 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JUNIATA AND NORTHEASTERN PERRY COUNTIES... At 1023 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Newport, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Liverpool and Millerstown. This includes the following highways... Routes 11 and 15 from MONTGOMERY FERRY to THE JUNIATA SNYDER COUNTY LINE. Routes 22 and 322 from Millerstown to near Newport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
